title: Did the deputy mayor of Florida die "suspicious " after criticizing David Hog?
subtitle: Several questionable websites complained about the "media blackout" of Jason Fitzsimmons' death after a survivor criticized Parkland's shooting.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: The deputy mayor of Broward County, Jason Fitzsimmons, died suspiciously after publishing a photo critical of Parkland shooting the survivor, David Hogg.
